overview: Experience the breath-taking journey through space in the Soyuz capsule which returned renowned British astronaut Tim Peake to earth after six months at the International Space Station.  Tim will be your guide on an out-of-this-world virtual reality mission that puts you in the pilot's seat of a Soyuz capsule—just like the one that brought him home.  The hugely popular VR experience reformatted as a communal 360 experience. Join Tim on his 400km journey back to Earth.
title: Space Descent 360° with Tim Peake
